column5: Is it legal to bring leeches back to the US from Canada?
Could you provide some references (web site addresses) to confirm that statement please?

Assuming I don't have a huge supply, I like to look arround the resort or lake the last day of fishing for a young family with small kids and give them the leeches and pointer or two on how to use them (if they haven't used them before.)
So it is or isn't? Anyone else?
Not in the opinion of at least one Customs Agent in International Falls. Coming home last July, we waited for another vehicle in our party while they walked about 2 dozen back to the CA side.
